K12D0660=D0997_H0630:168b-1: gra ha m'a tri ka n'a ma dha ra n'i /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:168b-3: gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:168b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:168b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:168b-6: bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na lha dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:168b-25: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa mang po rnams kyis bstod pa /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:168b-26: rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi byin gyi rlabs kyis rdo rje'i khri la bzhugs so //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:168b-27: byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang yang thabs cig ste /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:168b-28: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @169a *//
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-1: po rdo rje gtum po dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje gzhu can dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i tog dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i snying po dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i spyan dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-0: la sogs pa @169b byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-1: rnams kyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-2: ston to // bkod pa chen po'i rgyan gyi nor bu zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-9: yongs su byang ba'i chos ston to //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-10: de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'khor de dag la
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-11: bltas te langs nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-12: gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-13: du mar bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas spyan
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-14: sngar 'dug ste snyems pa dang bcas pas skyil mo
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-15: krung legs par bcas nas 'khor de dag la 'gying
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-16: bag tu bltas te rdo rje'i thal mo rang gi
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-17: snying gar bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-21: drag shul can gyi sems dang ldan pa /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-22: khro ba khro ba'i gzugs can dag /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-23: sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:169b-26: kha cig nor zas 'phrog par bgyid /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-3: de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod cing 'tshe
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-4: bar bgyid pa de rnams kyi slad du bcom ldan
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-5: 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-6: thams cad la srung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-7: / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-8: gang yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed pas sems can
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-9: thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gsang chen
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-10: bas kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-13: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-14: gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can shin tu khro ba dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-15: shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyi mchod pa dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-17: bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad do //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-18: de dag mchod pas mchod gyur cing //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-19: gnod pa byas na gnod byed pa //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-20: gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-21: ji lta bur ni 'gyur ba dang //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-22: lha rnams dang ni lha min dang //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-23: mi 'am ci dang klu dag dang //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170a-24: gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-0: mi rnams dang ni @170b mi ma yin //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-1: drag po gzi brjid chen po dang //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-2: khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'i //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-3: gsang sngags rnams dang mchod pa dag /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-4: rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-6: thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-7: par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-8: ga' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so; ;de nas de'i
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-9: mod la nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' thams cad
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-10: langs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-11: thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa byas te
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-12: phyag 'tshal nas pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-13: bar byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-16: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:170b-19: bdag cag rnams la sogs pas chos smra ba rnams
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-0: sa bcing ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur @171a *//
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-5: aom sh'i tam sha be sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-6: aom rakta aam ga ku m'a r'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-8: aom bri hasba ta ye sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-9: aom aa su rotta m'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-11: aom aa mri ta pri y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-12: aom dzyo ti shke ta bee sv'ah'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-15: gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas 'grub pa yin te /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-16: kha dog dang mthun par spos kyi dkyil 'khor sor
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-17: bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o;
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-20: dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul nas re re
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-21: la yang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o; ;lag na
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-22: rdo rje / de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-23: zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-25: de nas gza' rnams thams cad srung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-26: dbul po'i gdan las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171a-27: tshe zad pa las tshe ring por byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-0: lag na rdo @171b dge slong dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-4: gzhan yang sems kyi rigs gang yin pa dang /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-5: gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-6: kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-7: mi 'gyur ro // phyag na rdo rje /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-8: gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod par bya ste /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-9: nyin gcig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-10: ba gang yin pa de la gza' thams cad bdag
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-11: nyid kun gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-13: de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba yang sel bar byed do //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-15: thub pas gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba bka'
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-16: stsal pa / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-19: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-20: rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-21: gza' khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-27: pra sa ra pra sa ra /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:171b-29: na ma: padma dha r'a ya /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-1: h'a n'am; sarb'a sha pa ri pu ra k'a n'am
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-2: na mo rakshatt'a n'a na mo dv'a da sha ra
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-7: sa ra sa ra; pra sa ra pra sa ra /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-9: bi kri da bi kri ta /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-10: m'a ra ya ma ra ya /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-12: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-16: ksh'a pa ya ksh'a pa ya /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-19: d'a pa ya d'a pa ya /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-20: bcom ldan 'das ma bdag nyid myur du bstan du gsol /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-22: sems can thams cad la srung du gsol //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-25: sgyu skar rnams kyi gnod pa zlog tu gsol; ;bcom
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-26: ldan 'das ma rdzu 'phrul chen po mnga' ba sdang
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-27: ba'i sems can rnams bsal du gsol /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-28: bdag gi sdig pa rnams skam du gsol /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-35: au gre au gra r'u pe /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-37: ma ma sarba satv'a n'anytsa ma no ra tha /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-38: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi shthi te sa ma ye sv'ah'a; aom sv'ah'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-43: padma dha r'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-44: a'a di ty'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172a-46: dha ri n'a su t'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-1: pri ha spa ta ye sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-3: sha ni shtsa r'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-7: badzra dha r'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-8: padma dha r'a ya sv'ah'a; ku m'a r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-12: sarba dv'a da sha r'a shi ni bhya: sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-13: sarba au pa dra be bhya: sv'a h'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-14: aom sarba bidy'a h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-17: gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-18: sngags kyi tshig dngos sgrub thams cad kyi gzhi yin
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-19: no // phyag na rdo rje; gang yang gza' rnams
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-20: kyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-21: zla tha chung yar gyi ngo'i tshes bdun nas brtsams
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-22: te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas tshes bcu
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-23: bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod par byas te
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-24: gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-25: no // bya'o // de nas zla ba nya'i nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na /
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-26: de dag la lo dgu'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-29: rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:172b-31: gza' thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:173a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te legs so legs so //
K12D0660=D0997_H0630:173a-3: zhes gsol te mi snang bar gyur to //
